1131.content:
Tai stood up and went into the kitchen to see why their food was taking so long, when he got back there he saw a bunch of young men with knives and saws. It was filled with the dying screams of boys. Tai was shocked and turned around and saw a man grab him and threw him onto a bench and he was quickly striped of all of his clothes. Tai was now naked and crying as he watched as a man walked over to him and was sharpening his knives. "Its time to make those burgers your friends ordered". Tai was shocked as he realized what was going to happen to him. The man stabbed Tai in the leg and ripped it open and he started to cut off large steaks of flesh from Tai's legs. The man took the steaks and put them on the hot element and they started to sizzle and cook. Tai screamed and cried as he slowly bleed to death on the bench as his steaks were cooking.
Tai died on the bench as his leg steaks were done and made into the burgers that his friends had ordered, and they were taken out and feed to the boys.

"Hi Matt," T.K. Mum said as she came in.
"Hey Mum," Matt said.
Nancy sat down.
"What are you having,"
"We just had burgers but where about to leave," Tai explained.
The waiter came over with a trolley.
"Spaghetti and meat balls, on the house."
He passed a one bowl each to them.
"Thank you," Nancy said picking up a knife and fork.
They all began eating.
"This is delicious," Nancy said after the first forkful.
"The best," Tai said not stopping.
Once they were down Matt, Nancy and Tai fell asleep.

"Where'd the two boys go?" Nancy asked.

Another waiter came with the food.
"Another meal on the house," The waiter said.
"Oh, I couldn't," Nancy said.
"But we Insist," the waiter said.
